name: Mom's Black Eyed Peas Curry (Raungi) Vegan Gluten Free
description: Mom's Black Eyed Peas Curry (Raungi or Lobhia. Black Eyed Peas Curry Indian Recipe. Curried black eyed beans cooked with Indian spices and onion tomato sauce. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free.
recipeIngredient: 1 inch ginger chopped ((can be substituted with ginger paste))
4-5 cloves of garlic peeled and chopped ((can be substituted with garlic paste))
1/2 teaspoon red chili flakes or 1 green chili (to taste)
1 teaspoon Chana Masala powder blend or Garam masala
1 cup dry black eye peas soaked for an hour or overnight

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, add 3 medium chopped tomatoes, ginger, garlic, chili, lemon juice. Blend into a paste and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, add 3 medium chopped tomatoes, ginger, garlic, chili, lemon juice. Blend into a paste and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pressure cooker, add oil and onions.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pressure cooker, add oil and onions.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook until onions are translucent. Add in the spices, asofetida, garam masala or chana masala blend and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook until onions are translucent. Add in the spices, asofetida, garam masala or chana masala blend and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the blended tomato mixture and cook over medium low, partially covered with occasional stirring until the paste thickens and starts to leave oil (about 15-20 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the blended tomato mixture and cook over medium low, partially covered with occasional stirring until the paste thickens and starts to leave oil (about 15-20 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the salt, sugar and 1.5 cups water depending on your preference for thick or thin curry. Add in drained black eyed peas.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the salt, sugar and 1.5 cups water depending on your preference for thick or thin curry. Add in drained black eyed peas.

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook for 3-4 whistles(7 to 9 mins at high pressure).
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook for 3-4 whistles(7 to 9 mins at high pressure).

recipeInstructions.text: Let the pressure cooker release pressure by itself( 5 minutes). Adjust salt. Add more garam masala spice blend and chili flakes per taste. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the pressure cooker release pressure by itself( 5 minutes). Adjust salt. Add more garam masala spice blend and chili flakes per taste. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with lemon wedges, cilantro and Rotis or Naans(Indian flat breads) or Basmati Rice! Have a fun day!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with lemon wedges, cilantro and Rotis or Naans(Indian flat breads) or Basmati Rice! Have a fun day!

recipeInstructions.text: Saucepanr: Add 2 cups water, salt, soaked black eyed peas to the tomato mixture after step 4 in a saucepan. Cover and cook on low-medium for about an hour. Stir once or twice in between. Mash some black eyed peas, adjust water if needed. Serve hot. If using canned black eyed peas, cook with 1 cup water for 20 to 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Saucepanr: Add 2 cups water, salt, soaked black eyed peas to the tomato mixture after step 4 in a saucepan. Cover and cook on low-medium for about an hour. Stir once or twice in between. Mash some black eyed peas, adjust water if needed. Serve hot. If using canned black eyed peas, cook with 1 cup water for 20 to 25 minutes.

keywords: tomato curry sauce, traditional Indian meal, vegan curry recipe
